name: Royal Purple Palette
description: Rich purples creating luxurious, mysterious, and regal atmosphere

prompt.base: Royal purple color palette, rich purples, luxurious tones, regal color scheme, majestic hues, mysterious colors, opulent palette, nobility-inspired
prompt.positive: royal purple colors, deep purple (#4A148C), rich violet (#7B1FA2), lavender accent (#BA68C8), luxurious palette, majestic hues, mysterious colors, regal atmosphere, opulent tones, noble colors, purple harmony
prompt.negative: dull colors, muted tones, common palette, plain colors, ordinary hues, simple colors

technical.use_cases: Luxurious scenes, mysterious moods, regal environments, opulent atmospheres

variations.name: Imperial Purple
variations.modifier: deep purples, royal court, throne room atmosphere, imperial majesty, sovereign palette

variations.name: Mystical Purple
variations.modifier: magical purples, arcane atmosphere, supernatural vibes, enchanted palette, wizard aesthetic

variations.name: Romantic Purple
variations.modifier: soft purples, lavender tones, romantic atmosphere, dreamy vibes, tender palette

examples: A royal throne room with rich purple palette, luxurious tones, regal and majestic atmosphere
A mystical scene with deep purples, mysterious colors, magical and enchanted mood
